alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Spartanburg; Union; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 7:47PM EDT until July 29 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rutherford County in western North Carolina... Southern Cleveland County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northwestern York County in Upstate South Carolina... Eastern Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... Cherokee County in Upstate South Carolina... Northern Union County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 746 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Forest City to 8 miles north of Spartanburg, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Gaffney, Boiling Springs SC, Boiling Springs NC, Pacolet, Cowpens, Blacksburg, Mayo, Roebuck and Buffalo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
